SEARCH
Package dto

Class ApplyInternshipDTO

java.lang.Object
dto.ApplyInternshipDTO
public class ApplyInternshipDTO extends Object
Data Transfer Object for Application with enriched internship details. Used to return application data to the frontend with associated internship information.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
SC2002 SCED Group-6

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description

    applicationId
    Unique identifier for the application.

    private String

    Title of the internship opportunity.

    placementAcceptanceDate
    Date and time when the placement was accepted by the student.

    placementAccepted
    Flag indicating if the student has accepted the internship placement.
    private String
    representativeComments
    Comments or feedback from the company representative.
    private String
    staffComments
    Comments or feedback from the staff.

    Current status of the application.

    Date and time when the application status was last updated.
